Hard Questions.Prompts: Which insulating material commonly used as a thermal conductor for some types of electronic devices is extremely toxic if broken or crushed and the particles are accidentally inhaled?
What toxic material may be present in some electronic components such as high voltage capacitors and transformers?
Which of the following injuries can result from using high-power UHF or microwave transmitters?
Hard Questions.Answer: Localized heating of the body from RF exposure in excess of the MPE limits
